I helped co-found **BORI (Boricuas Organized for Impact)**, a student organization dedicated to building community and celebrating Puerto Rican culture at Georgia Tech.

*Photos from our events will be added soon!*

### Event History

#### Fall 2024

<strong>Inaugural BORI Event</strong>

- Homemade Coquito, Sandwiches de Mezclita, Sorullitos
- Introduce everyone to the club and its purpose/vision

<strong>Trivia Night with Snacks</strong>

- Hacer PR trivia questions, snacks

---

#### Spring 2025

<strong>Winter Org Fair: Enero 30 @11am-1pm</strong>

- Poster, Banderitas, Bocina, Hershey Kisses

<strong>BORI Kickoff: Febrero 6 @5pm</strong>

- Coquito, Sandwiches de Mezclita, Sorullitos

- Jueguitos tradicionales de PR y juegos PR themed y snacks
